title: EMA multistakeholder workshop 06.07.2024
text:
EMA multistakeholder workshop 06.07.2024
EMA invited industry to propose topics for discussion, of which ten were selected for discussion, see the agenda below. Most short talks were given by members of the EFSPI statistical methodology leaders group.

Agenda.
All slidedecks.
Summary of discussions.



Feedback
For feedback and questions send an email to efspieurope@gmail.com.

This page provides some resources for certain EFSPI activities.

title: EFSPI
text:
EFSPI trainings
On this webpage you find a calendar with links and materials related to biostatistics trainings and scientific events in Europe organized by EFSPI (Who is EFSPI?) or its National Organizations.

title: EFSPI statistical methodology leaders
text:
EFSPI statistical methodology leaders
In September 2023 EFSPI founded a new group EFSPI statistical methodology leaders, bringing together methodology leaders to work on topics of common interest.
Find more context in this linkedin post and this slidedeck.
A list of current members is available here.


Feedback
For feedback and questions send an email to efspieurope@gmail.com.
